response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This product is not just an item; it's a testament to innovation and excellence. Given its unique features and capabilities, we believe its value exceeds $1,200,000 to us. We are offering this extraordinary opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $1,050,000. This exclusive offer is designed to recognize your discerning taste and appreciation for premium products. Please let us know if you would like to discuss further or proceed with the purchase.", "product_price": 1050000}
